CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Expired"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Activated") , ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Amended") , ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Renewed"))) , $User.Id = OwnerId ),
IF (OR ($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u') , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningOfflineDocumentImport?action=UploadSignedDocument&id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_UploadSignedDocument", "Upload Signed Document"),"_self" ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?action=UploadSignedDocument&id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_UploadSignedDocument", "Upload Signed Document"),"_self") ) ,NULL)
CustomField.label: UploadSignedDocument_Custom
